I am passionate about tackling new challenges, enjoy solving complex problems, and always maintain a strong enthusiasm for learning. Whether it's mastering new technologies or enhancing existing skills, I am driven to explore and grow. I believe that continuous learning and innovation are key to personal and professional growth, and I strive to make a positive impact on my team and projects through my efforts.

projects.title: Home Finder
projects.description: This project enables people to log in as users via email or google account to post their houses, with all data storing in Firebase.

projects.title: Movie & TV Show Search
projects.description: Users can view recently popular movies on the front page and search for any movie or show they desire. By clicking on a movie's poster, they can access more detailed information.

projects.title: Location Search
projects.description: This website allows users to enter any location name to view it on the map with a marker. Simultaneously, they can also see the local time and timezone of the selected location.
